page.title: 03KITWELL HOUSING
page.content: My name is Melissa Bennett and I live on Kitwell Estate. In our house we have seven rooms and four cupboards.Three rooms are bedrooms and the other rooms are the living room,kitchen,bathroom and boiler room. In our house there is a loft to keep things in like old prams and carry-cots which we don't use anymore. Our backgarden is about five metres by seven metres.We have one swing,four small evergreen trees and a shed in the corner.Our garden is mostly grass.In one corner there are some slabs for the window cleaner to put his ladder on so that he does not ruin our garden.
